// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 DNESpecularAttenuation;
//   float4 DiffuseOverrideParameter;
//   float3 DistanceFieldParameters;
//   sampler2D LightAttenuationTexture;
//   float4 LightColorAndFalloffExponent;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   sampler2D ShadowTexture;
//   sampler2D ShadowWarpFunctionTexture;
//   float4 SpecularOverrideParameter;
//   float2 SpotAngles;
//   float3 SpotDirection;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_1;
//   bool bReceiveDynamicShadows;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                         Reg   Size
//   ---------------------------- ----- ----
//   bReceiveDynamicShadows       b0       1
//   DNESpecularAttenuation       c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias      c1       1
//   NvStereoEnabled              c3       1
//   DiffuseOverrideParameter     c4       1
//   SpecularOverrideParameter    c5       1
//   DNEResolution                c7       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0         c8       1
//   UniformPixelVector_1         c9       1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c10      1
//   DistanceFieldParameters      c11      1
//   SpotDirection                c12      1
//   SpotAngles                   c13      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture           s1       1
//   LightAttenuationTexture      s2       1
//   ShadowTexture                s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c2, 0, 2, 0.5, 1
    def c6, 0.0625, 0, -9.99999997e-007, 15
    def c14, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 0
    dcl_color v0.xyz
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v6.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --only-autofixed --ignore-parse-errors CRC32_D316CC5C_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    nrm_pp r0.xyz, v1
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v0
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r1.x
    mad_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.y, -r0.y
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, v1.w
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, v5
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v3
    mad_pp r1.xyw, r2.z, c2.xxzy, -r2.xyzz
    texld_pp r2, v2, s3
    add r0.y, r2.x, c11.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0.y, c11.y
    pow_sat_pp r2.x, r0.y, c11.z
    dp3 r0.y, v4, v4
    rsq r0.w, r0.y
    mul r4.xyz, r0.w, v4
    dp3 r0.w, r4, -c12
    add r0.w, r0.w, -c13.x
    mul_sat r0.w, r0.w, c13.y
    mul_pp r2.z, r0.w, r0.w
    mov r2.yw, c2.z
    texld_pp r4, r2, s0
    texld_pp r2, r2.zwzw, s0
    add r0.w, -r0.y, c2.w
    mul r0.w, r4.x, r0.w
    mul r5, r2.x, r0.w
    mov r6, r5
    texkill r6
    if b0
      mad r2.yz, vPos.xxyw, c7.xxyw, c7.xzww
      mul r5.xy, r2.yzzw, v6.w
      if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
        texld r6, c6, s1
        add r0.w, -r6.y, v6.w
        mad r5.z, r6.x, r0.w, r5.x
        mov r5.xy, r5.zyzw
        mov r0.w, v6.w
      else
        mov r0.w, v6.w
      endif
      rcp r0.w, r0.w
      mul r2.yz, r0.w, r5.xxyw
      mad r2.yz, r2, c1.xxyw, c1.xwzw
      texld r6, r2.yzzw, s2
      mul_pp r2.yzw, r6.xxyz, r6.xxyz
      mul_pp r2.yzw, r2, r4.x
    else
      mov_pp r2.yzw, r4.x
    endif
    mov_sat r0.y, r0.y
    add r0.y, -r0.y, c2.w
    pow_sat_pp r4.x, r0.y, c10.w
    mov r4.y, c2.z
    texld_pp r4, r4, s0
    abs r5.x, r1.z
    abs r5.yz, r0.xxzw
    dp3 r0.x, r5, c14
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, c9
    mov r0.w, c2.w
    add r4.yzw, r0.w, -c8.xxyz
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, r4.yzww
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, c4.w, c4
    mov_sat_pp r0.w, r3.z
    add r1.z, r0.w, c6.z
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, c0.w
    cmp_pp r0.w, r1.z, r0.w, c2.x
    dp3_sat_pp r1.x, r1.xyww, r3
    add r1.y, r1.x, c6.z
    pow_pp r3.x, r1.x, c6.w
    mul r1.x, r3.x, c0.x
    mul_pp r1.xzw, r1.x, c5.xyyz
    cmp_pp r1.xyz, r1.y, r1.xzww, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r0, r0.w, r1
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r2.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c10
    mul r0.xyz, r4.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r2.x, r0
    cmp oC0.xyz, -r5.w, c2.x, r0
    mov oC0.w, c2.x

// approximately 96 instruction slots used (6 texture, 90 arithmetic)
